text: Ving Rhames (born May 12, 1959) is an American actor. He has performed in many movies, including Pulp Fiction (1994) and Baby Boy (2001). ==Life== He was born near Harlem, New York. Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:People from Harlem
title: Ving Rhames
